biotools.summary: This is a MATLAB toolbox for the identification of parameters and parameter ensembles of ODE models from time-series data. The toolbox is based on incremental parameter estimation (IPE) and integrated flux parameter estimation (IFPE) methods .

bioschemas.name: REDEMPTION
bioschemas.summary: This is a MATLAB toolbox for the identification of parameters and parameter ensembles of ODE models from time-series data. The toolbox is based on incremental parameter estimation (IPE) and integrated flux parameter estimation (IFPE) methods .
